title: First World War as a total war and mobilization

content.question: Which of the following best supports the contention that the First World War was the first total war?

choices.label: Governments mobilized large segments of their populations and economies and targeted their opponents’ military and economic capabilities.
The militaries of all major powers used the most advanced weaponry available to them.
All the major European powers were involved in the war.
Many of the countries on the victorious side of the war were weakened politically by conflict.

content.answer: Governments mobilized large segments of their populations and economies and targeted their opponents’ military and economic capabilities.
